name: A writhing signet of Teros
data: It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'unholy ceremony'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'shielding of death'.
